short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unsure which episode to watch of your favorite sitcom? Leave it to Shuffle and Chill to pick an episode for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you've rewatched the same show a million times like I have, sometimes you have a hard time selecting the right episode. Install this extension, click the "Shuffle" button and it will choose for you.
